fields_of_interest: Consumers, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives:
•    Legislative own-initiative report on odometer manipulation in motor vehicles 
•    All consumer protection policy initiatives pertaining to or relevant for tackling odometer fraud.  
•    All transport policy initiatives pertaining to or relevant for tackling odometer fraud  
•    EU roadworthiness directive 
•    EU Mobility package
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Car-Pass asbl is the association that, in implementing the Act of 11 June 2004 to curb fraud involving the vehicle mileage, is in charge of recording the mileage of vehicles in Belgium. The not-for-profit organisation has been accredited for this purpose by the Royal Decree of 4 May 2006.
relevant_communication:
•    Participation in expert groups 
•    Participation in and speaker at public conferences 
•    Communication activities: media briefing and press releases when relevant
